Multiple winners
The following directors have won multiple awards:
*2 wins – Andrzej Wajda (1981, 1983)
*2 wins – David Fincher (2008, 2010)
*2 wins – Ang Lee (2005, 2012)
*2 wins – Alfonso Cuarón (2013, 2018)
